original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Isla Grande De Chiloe
overview: The Isla Grande De Chiloé is located off the west coast of southern Chile in the Pacific Ocean. It features amazing timber-built churches, an undulating landscape and villages supported by posts. Today the people of Chiloé live from agriculture and fishing and tourism is also becoming increasingly important.
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Isla Grande De Chiloe
